Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController

Class PlayingAreaController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.PlayingAreaController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocalModelListener, Listener, StateListener, UI
public class PlayingAreaController extends GUIController implements StateListener, LocalModelListener
A scene controller used to manage playing area scene.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes playing area scene. First, it builds infoHBox, then sets listeners for width and height of scene. Finally, loads all sub-scenes controllers and places them on stage.

    • buildTabPane

      private void buildTabPane()

    • buildInfoHBox

      private void buildInfoHBox()
      Builds infoHBox: it contains all infos about user, game and other players state.

    • allPlayersConnectedFactory

      private void allPlayersConnectedFactory(boolean allPlayersConnected)
      Displays an image (tick or X) in infoHBox whether all players are connected to the game
      Parameters:
      allPlayersConnected - true if and only all players are connected to the game

    • setBackgrounds

      private void setBackgrounds()
      Sets background to scene and all of its sub-scenes.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Rebuild infoHBox and displays paneFireworks when game ends.
